name: Laser Defender (Dapper Cat Games)
description:
Laser Defender was built by me (Tom) using section 6 of this course on Udemy.com. I spent a lot of time adding some features of my own to expand on the concept. For example enemies will now track the players position and fire in that direction (many hours we're spent trying to figure out how to get the laser prefab to rotate and face the direction of travel!)

Other added features:

  • Health percentage
  • Awesome sound effects created by my own voice!
  • Explosions!!
